text: Oni prosyat tebya vynesti resheniye. Skazhi: «Allakh vyneset dlya vas resheniye otnositel'no tekh, kto ne ostavlyayet posle sebya roditeley ili detey». Yesli umret muzhchina, u kotorogo net rebenka, no yest' sestra, to yey prinadlezhit polovina togo, chto on ostavil. On takzhe nasleduyet yey, yesli u neye net rebenka. Yesli ikh dve sestry, to im prinadlezhat dve treti togo, chto on ostavil. Yesli zhe oni yavlyayutsya brat'yami i sestrami, to muzhchine prinadlezhit dolya, ravnaya dole dvukh zhenshchin. Allakh raz"yasnyayet vam eto, chtoby vy ne vpali v zabluzhdeniye. Allakh vedayet o vsyakoy veshchi
